meanings.sent1: The flower is the beautest in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She wore the beautest dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The sunset painted the sky in the beautest colors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the beautest light in the room.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak was the beautest sight I had ever seen.

meanings.sent1: She beautest the room with fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: He beautest the garden by planting colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The artist beautest the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: Her words beautest the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The chef beautest the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.

meanings.sent1: She was known as the beautest in the village.
meanings.sent2: The beautest of the garden was the rose bush.
meanings.sent3: The beautest of the show was the grand finale.
meanings.sent4: The beautest of the collection was the rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The beautest of the group was chosen as the winner.
